original_text: The people give sacrifices in the fields to worship idols that seem like goats. They must never do this again. This rule is for now and for all time.
korean_text: 그들은 전에 음란하게 섬기던 숫염소에게 다시 제사하지 말 것이니라 이는 그들이 대대로 지킬 영원한 규례니라

sentences.original_text: The people give sacrifices in the fields
to worship idols that seem like goats
They must never do this again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것을 다시는 해서는 안 됩니다
